name: Family Party: 30 Great Games
description: Optimized for the Wii Remote, Family Party: 30 Great Games has more than 30 fun games to play as players tackle obstacle courses, plate spin, fire laser guns, test their wit at memory games and more. The game offers a wide variety of fun and addictive party games for up to 4 players featuring everything from track n' field, to playground games, to brain games and more.
